short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right-click a game name in a page and easily search for gameplay videos, deals, store pages,..

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Highlight a game name in a page
2. Right-click and select one of the options to open a new tab containing:
- Youtube gameplay videos
- GG.deals price offers and alerts
- Steam search
- etc ...
